title: Apply 'good triumphs over evil' motif to existing pages and add themed generated image assets

requirements.summary: Update Home and About page copy/section headings and iconography to consistently convey a “good triumphs over evil” motif while preserving the existing tattoo/rock + premium denim/western aesthetic (English only, no new pages).
acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero and at least one supporting section reference the “good triumphs over evil” theme through updated English headings/copy without changing the overall site style direction.
About page includes a brief, on-theme brand statement that explicitly conveys “good triumphs over evil” in the existing tone/voice.
No new pages are introduced; changes are limited to existing pages/components and styling already used in the app.

file_operations.description: Revise the hero headline/subheadline and at least one supporting section heading/body copy to explicitly reflect a “good triumphs over evil” narrative (tattoo-flash / distressed premium denim tone), keeping the current layout and styling patterns. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Add/adjust the brand story and mission copy to include a concise statement that explicitly says “good triumphs over evil,” matching the existing voice and keeping the current section structure and styling approach. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

requirements.summary: Add new generated static image assets for the theme and wire them into existing UI and product image mapping with safe fallbacks.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files (listed in Image Requirements) are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and load successfully in the UI (no broken image links).
At least one page-level visual (e.g., the Home hero) uses one of the new themed assets.
Product image mapping resolves the new themed product image keys to the newly generated asset filenames, with sensible fallbacks preserved.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner-triumph.dim_1600x900.png. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
Add the generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/product-triumph-denim-jacket.dim_1200x1200.png. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Add the generated static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/product-triumph-buckle-belt.dim_1200x1200.png. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Switch the Home hero banner background to use the new themed image asset (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner-triumph.dim_1600x900.png) while preserving the existing hero overlay/gradient and layout. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)

Extend IMAGE_MAP with new logical image keys for the themed products to resolve to the new generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/product-triumph-denim-jacket.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/product-triumph-graphic-tee.dim_1200x1200.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/product-triumph-buckle-belt.dim_1200x1200.png). Keep existing mappings intact and preserve the current fallback behavior to avoid broken product images. (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.)
